Key Match Events: Juan Soto blasted a go-ahead three-run homer in the 10th inning
Giancarlo Stanton launched a game-tying, two-run homer off Tanner Bibee in the sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge said, 'We’re going to win; we’re going to the World Series'
Aaron Boone said, 'To get to do it with these guys every single day, what they have is very special'
Jazz Chisholm Jr. said, 'When I saw Soto foul off the changeup, I said, 'Oh, we're out of here''
Luke Weaver said, 'The ball was sitting in the air, it looked a little high for my taste. But it sounded loud, so I thought there was a chance'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Soto stopped in the baseline on his way around the bases, screaming into the first-base dugout and thumping his chest animatedly
Soto’s contributions are a major reason why the Yankees have reached this stage
General manager Brian Cashman said, 'We gave up a lot' and 'It was a big chess move, no doubt about it, that was designed to increase our chances. And it did.'
